title: Restaurants
itunes:title: Restaurants
description:
In this episode Bobby and Sophie explore what can make a restaurant so special. First, they discuss what they love as a guest of a restaurant. Then Bobby explains the behind the scenes perspective as a builder of restaurants. And finally, Bobby and Sophie head to the stove to make classic Parisian style french fries.

For more information on "Always Hungry", follow the hosts on Instagram:

Sophie's page here: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Bobby's page here: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
